content: Credit Card Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Jul 2019Is DBS the only bank where you can pay your credit card bills in-app? Its the most convenient method of paying, I’m just wondering if its the same for the other banks or do I still have to use AXS to pay them off. Thank you!3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yusheng LiuLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 05 Jul 2019I believe a lot of bank's app can do so.Personally i used citibank, standart, and yes, i am able to pay credit card in-app.Additionally, if i remember correctly, standart might be the first mobile bank, which allow you to pay other bank's credit card bills.0 comments1
YCYewFong ChuaLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 05 Jul 2019Ocbc banking app can also pay credit cards bills. Not only DBS.0 comments0
Yinghua LiuLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 05 Jul 2019Don’t think DBS is the only bank. I can do it via UOB app (pay for UOB Card bill or standard Chartered card bill)0 comments0
